original_text: the only thing worse than your substandard , run-of-the-mill hollywood picture is an angst-ridden attempt to be profound .
generated_text:
1. "I'd rather watch paint dry than sit through another pretentious, overhyped film trying to be something it's not."
2. "The most underwhelming experience I've had at the cinema - a complete waste of time and money."
3. "The only thing more cringeworthy than this movie is the people who actually paid to see it."
4. "A mind-numbing, soulless exercise in cinematic mediocrity - avoid it like the plague."
